title: Online Internship-Based Practical Training Course for Elementary Teachers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary education curricula and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: A customized course for learners aiming to develop elementary teaching expertise as working professionals, optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply pedagogical content knowledge (PCK) required in elementary language education settings through internship-based practical training
Learners can demonstrate reflective thinking skills through peer feedback and case analysis
Learners can simulate and evaluate classroom management strategies using online collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
